程序包 src.main.java.Login_story1_3

类 LoginController

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.Login_story1_3.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
Title : LoginController.java Description: Controller for the login view. It handles user authentication with email/password and CAPTCHA, supports an admin backdoor, opens the appropriate next window, and ensures VIP status is updated if expired.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    String
    encryptPassword(String password)
    Encrypts a plaintext password using SHA-256 and Base64 encoding.
    private void
    generateCaptcha()
    Generates a new 4-character alphanumeric CAPTCHA, displays it in the label, and clears the input field.
    private void
    handleLogin()
    Handles the login button press: 1) Verifies the CAPTCHA. 2) Allows admin login for "Administration@qq.com"/"000000". 3) Validates the user against CSV credentials. 4) Updates session nickname and opens the main menu on success. 5) Checks and updates VIP expiry status after login.
    private void
    handleRegister()
    Opens the registration window and closes the login form.
    void
    initialize()
    Initializes the login form by generating the first CAPTCHA and wiring the refresh button to regenerate it.
    boolean
    isValidEmail(String email)
     
    List<User>
    loadUsersFromCSV()
    Loads all users from data/user.csv into a List.
    private void
    showAlert(String title, String message)
    Displays an information alert with the given title and message.
    private void
    updateVIPStatusInCSV(String userId, String newStatus)
    Updates the VIP status field in the CSV for the given user ID.
    User
    validateUser(String email, String password)
    Validates the user's email and password against records in data/user.csv.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the login form by generating the first CAPTCHA and wiring the refresh button to regenerate it.

    • handleLogin

      private void handleLogin()
      Handles the login button press: 1) Verifies the CAPTCHA. 2) Allows admin login for "Administration@qq.com"/"000000". 3) Validates the user against CSV credentials. 4) Updates session nickname and opens the main menu on success. 5) Checks and updates VIP expiry status after login.

    • isValidEmail

      public boolean isValidEmail(String email)

    • encryptPassword

      public String encryptPassword(String password) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Encrypts a plaintext password using SHA-256 and Base64 encoding.
      参数:
      password - the raw password to encrypt
      返回:
      the Base64-encoded SHA-256 hash
      抛出:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if SHA-256 is not available

    • validateUser

      public User validateUser(String email, String password)
      Validates the user's email and password against records in data/user.csv.
      参数:
      email - the user's email
      password - the plaintext password
      返回:
      a User object if credentials match; null otherwise

    • updateVIPStatusInCSV

      private void updateVIPStatusInCSV(String userId, String newStatus)
      Updates the VIP status field in the CSV for the given user ID.
      参数:
      userId - the ID of the user to update
      newStatus - the new VIP status ("VIP" or "Normal")

    • generateCaptcha

      private void generateCaptcha()
      Generates a new 4-character alphanumeric CAPTCHA, displays it in the label, and clears the input field.

    • handleRegister

      private void handleRegister()
      Opens the registration window and closes the login form.

    • loadUsersFromCSV

      public List<User> loadUsersFromCSV()
      Loads all users from data/user.csv into a List.
      返回:
      a List of User objects parsed from the CSV

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays an information alert with the given title and message.
      参数:
      title - the alert title
      message - the alert message text
